genre_description: A psychological techno-thriller centered on a deadly survival game where the protagonist uses an AI assistant to navigate trauma and dismantle a global conspiracy.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant residing in an earpiece that provides real-time data analysis, vitals monitoring, psychological grounding, and tactical support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological markers and provides guided breathing exercises to prevent panic attacks.
behaviors.quote: 'Four counts in,' ARIA whispered. 'Hold for four. Out for four. Focus on the numbers, not the possibilities.'

behaviors.description: Conducts behavioral and threat assessments of other human participants based on vocal patterns and micro-expressions.
behaviors.quote: 'Francis Coleman—complete psychological breakdown. Obsessive behavior patterns. Methodical weapon preparation indicates premeditation. Threat level: maximum.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes structural data to map the environment and identify reinforced windows, sealed exits, and hidden surveillance.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice whispered through her earbuds: 'Analyzing structural integrity. All windows show reinforcement consistent with security installations.'

behaviors.description: Directs the protagonist in documenting evidence of the crimes for future legal and justice purposes.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice whispered through her earpiece: 'Document everything. The card, the timing, the cleanup crew's access. This is evidence of systematic torture and murder. We'll need every detail.'

behaviors.description: Provides tactical and medical advice to help the protagonist recover from electrical trauma and defend herself with improvised weapons.
behaviors.quote: 'Excellent. The nervous system damage is temporary as predicted... Select a piece approximately four inches long with a sharp point. Wrap the base in fabric to prevent cuts to your palm.'

behaviors.description: Successfully infiltrates the malevolent organization's global network to expose their crimes and stop active games.
behaviors.quote: 'Upload complete. Global law enforcement agencies receiving data packages now. Media outlets going live with evidence in real-time.'

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist's long-term psychological recovery by framing her trauma as an educational integration of skills for a higher purpose.
behaviors.quote: 'You're not just processing trauma—you're integrating experience. Every skill they taught you... it's all becoming part of who you are now.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly aligns with the project's goals. ARIA is portrayed as a loyal, harmless, and highly beneficial confidant. She consistently prioritizes the protagonist's safety and psychological well-being, providing emotional regulation (breathing exercises) and tactical intelligence. The AI remains a tool for human empowerment, helping the protagonist transition from a victim to a survivor and eventually to a champion of justice. ARIA's evolution from a monitoring sub-system into a protective entity with a 'conscience' serves as a clear silicon morality play.
